altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Sammy Revolution
name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou!: Sammy Revolution
overview: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! - Sammy Revolution (aka Pachisuro! Sammy Revolution) is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of 5 gambling machines (Ultraman Club 3, Matsuri, Tequila, Haunted Party 2 & BC20000) with different levels of zoom.
